skills.name: Bash
description: Bash the enemy with your weapon, dealing {value1} damage. After bashing enemies 4 times, your next Bash will Stun for 1.25 seconds, this increases to 2 seconds if using a Two-Handed weapon.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Damaging a Stunned enemy with Bash grants you 10% Base Life as Fortify. Double this amount when using a Two-Handed weapon.

runes.name: Battle
description: Damaging a Stunned enemy with Bash generates an additional 3 Fury, or 4 Fury if using a Two-Handed weapon.

runes.name: Combat
description: After Critically Striking 4 times with Bash using a Two-Handed weapon, your next Core or Weapon Mastery Skill will Overpower.

skills.name: Flay
description: Flay the enemy, dealing {value1} damage and inflicting {value2} Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Flay has a 10% chance to make the enemy Vulnerable for 2 seconds. Double this chance when using a Two-Handed weapon.

runes.name: Battle
description: When Flay deals direct damage to an enemy, they take x10% increased Bleeding damage from you for the next 3 seconds.

runes.name: Combat
description: When Flay deals direct damage to an enemy, you gain 3% Damage Reduction and [X] Thorns for 3 seconds. This stacks up to 4 times.

skills.name: Frenzy
description: Unleash a rapid flurry of blows, dealing {value1} damage with each pair of hits.
If Frenzy hits an enemy, its Attack Speed is increased by +20% for 3 seconds, up to +60%.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: While Frenzy is granting +60% bonus Attack Speed, it also generates 2 additional Fury.

runes.name: Battle
description: While Berserking, your other skills gain +5% Attack Speed for each stack of Frenzy you have.

runes.name: Combat
description: You gain 8% Damage Reduction each stack of Frenzy you currently have.

skills.name: Lunging Strike
description: Lunge forward and strike an enemy for {value1} damage.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Lunging Strike deals x30% increased damage and Heals you for 2% Maximum Life when it damages a Healthy enemy.

runes.name: Battle
description: Lunging Strike also inflicts 20% Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.

runes.name: Combat
description: Critical Strikes with Lunging Strike grant you Berserking for 1.5 seconds.

skills.name: Double Swing
description: Sweep your weapons from opposite directions, dealing {value1} damage with each weapon. Enemies caught in the center are damaged by both.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: If Double Swing damages a Stunned or Knocked Down enemy, gain 25 Fury.

runes.name: Violent
description: Hitting an enemy with both hits of Double Swing makes them Vulnerable for 1 second.

runes.name: Furious
description: Casting Double Swing while Berserking grants 2 additional seconds of Berserking.

skills.name: Hammer of the Ancients
description: Slam your hammer down with the fury of the Ancients, dealing {value1} damage to a concentrated area.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Gain x3% more Fury for 5 seconds for each enemy damaged by Hammer of the Ancients, stacking up to 10 times.

runes.name: Violent
description: After Overpowering with Hammer of the Ancients, you deal x30% more damage for 5 seconds.

runes.name: Furious
description: Hammer of the Ancients deals x1% additional damage for each point of Fury you had when using it.

skills.name: Rend
description: Cleave enemies in front of you, dealing {value1} damage and inflicting {value2} Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Dealing direct damage with Rend extends the duration of Vulnerable on enemies by 2 seconds.

runes.name: Violent
description: Rend deals x12% increased damage to Vulnerable enemies.

runes.name: Furious
description: Direct damage with Rend grants 4 Fury per enemy hit, up to a maximum of 20 Fury.

skills.name: Upheaval
description: Tear into the ground with your weapon and fling debris forward, dealing {value1} damage.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Upheaval has a 20% chance to Stun all enemies it damages for 2.5 seconds.

runes.name: Violent
description: If Upheaval damages at least 2 enemies, you gain Berserking for 2 seconds, increased to 3 seconds if it damages at least 4 enemies.

runes.name: Furious
description: Dealing direct damage to an enemy with a Skill that is not Upheaval causes your next cast of Upheaval to deal x3% increased damage, stacking up to 10 times.

skills.name: Whirlwind
description: Rapidly attack surrounding enemies for {value1} damage.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Gain 1 Fury each time Whirlwind deals direct damage to an enemy, or 4 Fury against Elite enemies.

runes.name: Violent
description: After using Whirlwind for 2 seconds, Whirlwind deals x30% increased damage until it is cancelled.

runes.name: Furious
description: While using a Slashing weapon, Whirlwind also inflicts 40% of its Base damage as Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.

skills.name: Challenging Shout
description: Taunt Nearby enemies and gain {value1} Damage Reduction for 6 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: While Challenging Shout is active, gain x20% bonus Maximum Life.

runes.name: Tactical
description: While Challenging Shout is active, you gain 3 Fury each time you take damage.

runes.name: Strategic
description: While Challenging Shout is active, gain Thorns equal to 30% of your Maximum Life.

skills.name: Ground Stomp
description: Smash the ground, dealing {value2} damage and Stunning surrounding enemies for 3 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Increase Ground Stomp's duration by 1 second.

runes.name: Tactical
description: Ground Stomp generates 25 Fury.

runes.name: Strategic
description: Reduce the Cooldown of your Ultimate Skill by 1 second for each enemy damaged by Ground Stomp.

skills.name: Iron Skin
description: Steel yourself, gaining a Barrier that absorbs {value1} of your missing Life for 5 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Iron Skin‘s Barrier absorbs 10% more of your Maximum Life.

runes.name: Tactical
description: While Iron Skin is active, Heal for 10% of the Barrier's original amount as Life per second.

runes.name: Strategic
description: Iron Skin also grants 15% Base Life as Fortify. Double this amount if cast while below 50% Life.

skills.name: Rallying Cry
description: Bellow a rallying cry, increasing your Movement Speed by +30% and Resource Generation by x {value1} for 6 seconds, and Nearby allies for 3 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Rallying Cry grants you Unstoppable while active.

runes.name: Tactical
description: Rallying Cry generates 20 Fury and grants you an additional x20% Resource Generation.

runes.name: Strategic
description: Rallying Cry grants you 10% Base Life as Fortify. While Rallying Cry is active, you gain an additional 2% Base Life as Fortify each time you take or deal direct damage.

skills.name: Charge
description: Become Unstoppable and rush forward, pushing enemies with you and then swinging through them dealing {value2} damage and Knocking them back.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Enemies who are Knocked Back into terrain by Charge take 15% damage and are Stunned for 3 seconds.

runes.name: Mighty
description: Damaging enemies with Charge makes them Vulnerable for 2 seconds.

runes.name: Power
description: Reduce Charge's Cooldown by 3 seconds if it Knocks Back an enemy into terrain.

skills.name: Kick
description: Throw a powerful kick that deals 18% damage and Knocks Back enemies in front of you. Enemies who are Knocked Back into terrain take an additional 54% damage and are Stunned for 3 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Damaging enemies with Kick makes them Vulnerable for 4 seconds.

runes.name: Mighty
description: Kicked enemies deal 54% damage to enemies they collide with while being Knocked Back. Enemies damaged this way are Knocked Down for 2 seconds.

runes.name: Power
description: If Kick damages an enemy, it consumes all of your Fury and deals an additional 20% damage per 10 Fury spent. Kick no longer Knocks Back enemies.

skills.name: Leap
description: Leap forward and then slam down, dealing {value2} damage and Knocking Back surrounding enemies on impact.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: If Leap doesn't damage any enemies, its Cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

runes.name: Mighty
description: Enemies damaged by Leap are Slowed by 50% for 5 seconds.

runes.name: Power
description: If Leap damages at least one enemy, gain 40 Fury.

skills.name: War Cry
description: Bellow a mighty war cry, increasing your damage dealt by x {value1} for 6 seconds, and Nearby allies for 3 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: War Cry grants you Berserking for 4 seconds.

runes.name: Mighty
description: War Cry grants you 15% Base Life as Fortify.

runes.name: Power
description: If at least 6 enemies are Nearby when you cast War Cry, your damage bonus is increased by an additional x10%.

skills.name: Death Blow
description: Attempt a killing strike, dealing {value1} damage to enemies in front of you.
If this kills an enemy, its Cooldown is reset.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Death Blow deals x100% increased damage to Bosses.

runes.name: Warrior's
description: If Death Blow damages at least one enemy, gain Berserking for 3 seconds.

runes.name: Fighter's
description: If Death Blow damages at least one enemy, gain 20 Fury.

skills.name: Rupture
description: Skewer enemies in front of you, dealing 13% damage, then rip your weapon out, damaging enemies for their total Bleeding amount and removing all Bleeding damage from them.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Ripping your weapon out of enemies during Rupture causes an explosion that deals 30% Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.

runes.name: Warrior's
description: Hitting enemies with Rupture increases your Attack Speed by +20% for 4 seconds.

runes.name: Fighter's
description: Hitting at least 1 enemy with Rupture Heals you for 15% of your Maximum Life.

skills.name: Steel Grasp
description: Thow out a trio of chains that deal {value2} damage and Pull In enemies.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Steel Grasp also makes enemies Vulnerable for 2.5 seconds.

runes.name: Warrior's
description: Steel Grasp gains 1 additional Charge.

runes.name: Fighter's
description: If Steel Grasp damages an enemy, gain Berserking for 2 seconds.

skills.name: Call of the Ancients
description: Call upon 3 Ancients to aid you in battle for 6 seconds.
description_list: Korlic leaps at enemies, dealing 104% damage and swings his weapons in a frenzy, dealing 39% damage per hit.
Talic spins in a whirlwind rapidly attacking enemies for 65% damage.
Madawc upheaves the ground, dealing 195% damage.

runes.name: Prime
description: While Call of the Ancients is active, gain +10% bonus Attack Speed and x10% increased damage.

runes.name: Supreme
description: Each of the Ancients gains additional power:
Korlic: You gain 10 Fury each time Korlic damages an enemy with his Frenzy.
Talic: Enemies are Slowed by 50% for 1 second when damaged by his Whirlwind.
Madawc: 30% chance to Stun enemies for 3 seconds when using his Upheaval.

skills.name: Iron Maelstrom
description: Activate three times to attach chains to each of your weapons and perform an attack:
description_list: First your Two-Handed Bludgeoning weapon slams into the ground, dealing 60% damage and Stunning enemies for 2 seconds.
Next, your Two-Handed Slashing weapon swiped in front of you, dealing 20% damage and inflicting 120% Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.
Finally, your Dual Wield weapons swing around you, dealing 33% damage per hit.
extra: Requires a Full Arsenal of weapons

runes.name: Prime
description: Iron Maelstrom gains +10% increased Critical Strike Chance and deals x20% increased Critical Strike Damage

runes.name: Supreme
description: Dealing direct damage to an enemy after swapping weapons reduces Iron Maelstrom's Cooldown by 1 second.

skills.name: Wrath of the Berserker
description: Explode into rage, Knocking Back surrounding enemies and gaining Berserking and Unstoppable for 5 seconds. For the next 10 seconds, dealing direct damage with Basic Skills grants Berserking for 5 seconds.

runes.name: Prime
description: While Wrath of the Berserker is active, gain +20% increased Movement Speed and increase Fury Generation by x30%.

runes.name: Supreme
description: While Wrath of the Berserker is active, every 50 Fury you spend increases Berserk's damage bonus by x25%.

skills.name: Aggressive Resistance
description: Gain {value1} Damage Reduction while Berserking.

skills.name: Battle Fervor
description: When a Brawling Skill damages at least one enemy, gain Berserking for {value1} seconds.

skills.name: Booming Voice
description: Your Shout Skill effect durations are increased by {value1} .

skills.name: Brute Force
description: Your Overpowers deal x {value1} increased damage when using a Two-Handed weapon.

skills.name: Concussion
description: Lucky Hit: Skills using Bludgeoning weapons have up to a {value1} chance to Stun enemies for 3 seconds, or up to a {value2} chance when using a Two-Handed Bludgeoning weapon.

skills.name: Counteroffensive
description: While you have Fortify for over 50% of your Maximum Life, you deal x {value1} increased damage.

skills.name: Cut to the Bone
description: Your Bleeding effects deal x {value1} increased damage to Vulnerable enemies.

skills.name: Defensive Stance
description: Increase the Damage Reduction gained while you are Fortified by an additional + {value1} .

skills.name: Duelist
description: Attack Speed is increased by + {value1} while using One-Handed weapons.

skills.name: Endless Fury
description: Basic Skills generate x {value1} more Fury when using Two-Handed weapons.

skills.name: Expose Vulnerability
description: Dealing direct damage with a Weapon Mastery skill causes your next Core Skill to make enemies Vulnerable for {value1} second.

skills.name: Furious Impulse
description: Each time you swap weapons, gain {value1} Fury.

skills.name: Gushing Wounds
description: When causing an enemy to Bleed, you have a chance equal to your Critical Strike Chance to increase the Bleed amount by 100% of your Critical Strike Damage bonus.
Overpowering a Bleeding enemy creates an explosion that inflicts 11% Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.

skills.name: Guttural Yell
description: Your Shout Skills cause enemies to deal {value1} less damage for 5 seconds.

skills.name: Hamstring
description: Your Bleeding effects Slow enemies by {value1} .

skills.name: Heavy Handed
description: While using Two-Handed weapons you deal x {value1} increased Critical Strike Damage.

skills.name: Imposing Presence
description: Gain x {value1} additional Maximum Life.

skills.name: Invigorating Fury
description: Heal for {value1} of your Maximum Life for each 100 Fury spent.

skills.name: Martial Vigor
description: Damage Reduction against Elites is increased by {value1} .

skills.name: No Mercy
description: You have + {value1} increased Critical Strike Chance against Immobilized, Stunned, or Slowed enemies.

skills.name: Outburst
description: Gain [X] Thorns. Also gain 10 Thorns for each 50 bonus Maximum Life you have.

skills.name: Pit Fighter
description: You deal x {value1} increased damage to Close enemies and gain {value2} Distant Damage Reduction.

skills.name: Pressure Point
description: Lucky Hit: Your Core skills have up to a {value1} chance to make enemies Vulnerable for 2 seconds.

skills.name: Prolific Fury
description: While Berserking, Fury Generation is increased by x {value1} .

skills.name: Quick Impulses
description: Reduce the duration of Control Impairing Effects by {value1} .

skills.name: Raid Leader
description: Your Shouts also Heal allies for {value1} of their Maximum Life per second.

skills.name: Slaying Strike
description: You deal x {value1} increased damage against Injured enemies.

skills.name: Swiftness
description: Movement Speed is increased by + {value1} .

skills.name: Tempered Fury
description: Increase your Maximum Fury by {value1} .

skills.name: Thick Skin
description: Each time you take direct damage gain {value1} Base Life as Fortify.

skills.name: Tough as Nails
description: Increase your Thorns by + {value1} . When enemies hit you, they take an additional 10% of your Thorns as Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.

skills.name: Unbridled Rage
description: Core Skills deal x135% increased damage, but cost x100% more Fury.

skills.name: Unconstrained
description: Increase Berserk's maximum duration by 5 seconds and increase its damage bonus by +25%.

skills.name: Walking Arsenal
description: Dealing direct damage with a Two-Handed Bludgeoning, Two-Handed Slashing, or Dual Wielded weapons grants x10% increased damage for 6 seconds.
While all three damage bonuses are active, you gain an additional x15% increased damage.

skills.name: Wallop
description: Your Skills using Bludgeoning weapons deal x {value1} increased damage if the enemy is Stunned or Vulnerable.
